name: nnsqcld

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wcel(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cn), wcel(c0, cn))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cn))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cn))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cn))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cn))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cn))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cn))

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cn))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cn))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cn))

comment: The naturals are closed under squaring. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)
